Page said Eric Schmidt had done an outstanding job leading Google for the last decade. The results speak for themselves. The news surprised and worried Google observers. ''The executive change is very much unexpected, and somewhat of a concern to investors,'' said Clayton Moran, an analyst at Benchmark Co..

Ant McPartlin admitted BGT had changed without those two big egos to prick. He said: It has changed the mood of the show but, you know, it might be for the better. ''Hoff does a great job but isn't Simon Cowell or Piers Morgan . You miss Simon Cowell because he is the best judge. He has that ability to say what you at home are thinking. Declan Donnelly added: ''For me, it's just great to be able to introduce the guy from Knight Rider every day... to a backing track of the Knight Rider theme tune.''

As for honoring a convicted felon, Dwaine Caraway said, ''I care deeply about animals'' and ''am deeply sorry to offend anyone who loves animals.'' He acknowledged Michael Vick 's past but noted that since making some bad choices, Michael Vick has devoted time to speaking to children about staying in school staying away from drugs, making positive choices about picking friends and the importance of education.
